about_the_game:
Note: This game contains spicy and unpredictable humor that may not be suitable for all players. Supervision by a Mononc is advised.

Les Aventures de Mononc is a classic turn-based RPG focused on exploration and adventure, where satirical and spicy humor often makes an unexpected appearance. Freely explore a vast archipelago and embark on an epic quest filled with hidden treasures, mysteries to uncover, and challenges to overcome.

In this game, you'll meet characters who are both endearing and quirky, adding richness to your adventure with their unique and often hilarious dialogues. The dialogues adapt based on the characters present in your team, bringing a dynamic dimension to each interaction.

The challenges you encounter will vary depending on the regions you explore, requiring careful planning for each mission. Recruit and customize your team to tackle these challenges according to your play style while exploring diverse landscapes, dark dungeons, and sprawling labyrinths. Resource management, like maintaining light in mines or using Screaming Peppers to combat the cold, will be crucial for surviving in this unpredictable environment.

Turn-based combat demands both speed and strategy, which will appeal to veterans of the genre. Fleeing won't always be an option, and you'll need to be cunning to overcome the most formidable foes.

The original and captivating main story will keep you on the edge of your seat from start to finish. Alongside it, complex side missions and treasure hunts offer a plethora of additional activities to extend your enjoyment. Dive into this unique adventure, where every encounter is a new source of laughter and surprises, and where every dungeon holds dangers and mysteries waiting to be explored.
